events.name: Salem Walking Tours
events.description: Salem's history from a Satanic perspective by local Satanic Salem witch Thomas Vallor. This is an hour long presentation.

events.name: Satanic Dungeons & Dragons
events.description: DM: Christopher Robichaud ... Friends and members of the Satanic Temple play the popular version of Dungeons & Dragons in the 1980s--First Edition D&D--in the way that everyone was afraid the game was being played back then. Players will get a chance to enjoy an expanded version of the Judges Guild classic old-school module, Inferno (by Geoffry O. Dale), in which characters must descend into the depths of Dante's Hell. But this time around, it's because they're on a rescue mission to release the Dark Prince from his frozen prison.

events.name: See Food Spooktacular
events.description: Satanic Chef Adam Dodge shares cooking tips and tricks. In my introductory class learn how to shuck oysters, make Tuna tar tar and crab sofritto.

events.name: DJ incrprl
events.description: Film of the day by Lucien Greaves.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry
events.description: Meet your new best friend, a fruit bat or insect bat from BatWorld, a shelter in Texas that cares for these sweethearts. Learn more about their work at batworld.org

events.name: Library
events.description: The Satanic Panic Archive Library is open all night. Many of these texts exist nowhere else in the world.

events.name: Down the Rabbit Hole
events.description: Down the rabbit hole...meet Winston and Winona, Ada's beloved rabbits!
